title: Two people riding a rotating platform

content.question: Two people, <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, are riding a large horizontal rotating platform. The platform rotates around its center. If person <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is twice as far from the center as person <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: Both people have the same angular speed, but person <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a greater tangential speed.
Both people have the same tangential speed, but person <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a greater angular speed.
Both people have the same angular speed and tangential speed.
Both people have the same angular speed, but person <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a greater tangential speed.
Person <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has both a greater angular speed and a greater tangential speed.

content.answer: Both people have the same angular speed, but person <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a greater tangential speed.
